alert.note: Alert for Adams; Morgan; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:56PM MDT until July 20 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... West central Washington County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 256 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shamrock, or 26 miles south of Fort Morgan, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Shamrock around 300 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Woodrow and Gary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
